title: Winrates Shmin shmates
body:
https://40.media.tumblr.com/e237c0038cd0ca09972d1246486d1bb7/tumblr_nnqhkimp321rd583ko1_540.png

Won a game with Shyvana, Bard, Elise, and Azir on my team. WINRATES MEAN NOTHING. LONG LIVE THE 45%!!!

replies.body: Win rates probably get screwed from people in low elo trying to copy stuff they see in high elo.

DID YOU EVER THINK IT'S JUST BECAUSE GRAVES IS SO FUCKING BROKEN RIGHT NOW!!!1!  I MEAN FFS RITO, HE'S GOAT A 70% WIN RATE RIGHT NOW!

****

In all seriousness, you're right.  I had two players on my team last game that pretty much gave up because we had a Bard on our team with [me] Gangplank Jungle.  I was able to rally our troops to victory with Gangplank's E, despite being behind, and we won the game with some good teamplay, despite them having a Zed, and a Gold Janna.
Wut. He's got a 49% in gold+, 50% globally. 0.o
